welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Barnoldswick, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom! Known for its beautiful landscapes and thriving local community, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our city's charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Leeds/Bradford Airport serves mainly low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with unlimited free access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Linton-On-Ouse Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Warton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Warton Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
